Text:
Less than an hour after broadcast in the UK, and i'm snagging it on a system in the mountains of WV. Ah, torrenty goodness (assuming a seeder appears soon). 

Thx to TvTeam and all future s/l's... Sincerely appreciated!
Thank you so much for this -- just finished watching it and it is perfect A10/V10 - and also perfectly wonderful and inspiring to watch - a terrific film.
